SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local n = MTG():GetActionRepCount() local targetPlayer = EffectController() local filter = Object():GetFilter() local parity = n % 2 if targetPlayer ~= nil and n < 4 then if parity == 0 then filter:Clear() filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetZone( ZONE_HAND ) filter:SetPlayer( targetPlayer ) if n == 0 then targetPlayer:ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CARD_TO_DISCARD", EffectDC():Make_Targets(1) ) else targetPlayer:ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_CARD_TO_DISCARD", EffectDC():Make_Targets(2) ) end return true else local targetDC = nil if n == 1 then targetDC = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1) else targetDC = EffectDC():Get_Targets(2) end if targetDC ~= nil then local target_card = targetDC:Get_NthCardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then if target_card:GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) ~= 0 then target_card:Discard() return false else target_card:Discard() return true end else return false end else return false end end else return false end
